name: GitHub Actions: Release Please
description: Automate releases with Google Release Please.

files.template:
name: release-please

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]

jobs:
  release-please:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: google-github-actions/release-please-action@v4
        with:
          release-type: node
          package-name: repo
